mean_cn: n. 扰乱，打扰；骚乱，混乱
mean_en: the act of disturbing somebody/something or the fact of being disturbed; actions that make you stop what you are doing, or that upset the normal state that something is in
sentence: The loud music was such a disturbance whilst I was trying to work.
sentence_trans: 在我工作时，如此大声的音乐简直是巨大的干扰！
word_etyma: disturb打扰 + ance表名词 → disturbance骚动，动乱
